name: danyg-go-to-test
description: Toggle between test and file with different strategies

markdownEnumDescriptions: Maven Like style, where the test files are in a different directory (test instead of src) at project root level with the same directory structure as the source files and `.test.` and same extension.
Maven style, where the test files are in a different directory (test instead of main) at src level with the same directory structure as the source files and `.test.` and same extension.
Same directory style, where the test files are in the same directory as the source file, with the extra `.test.` and same extension.
__tests__ directory style, where the test are inside of a `__tests__` directory inside the same directory as the source file.
goToTest.strategy.description: Strategy to be used to locate or create the test file.

goToTest.match.markdownDescription: (Only used when `#goToTest.strategy#`=`custom`) RegExp which would match the source file path and create matching groups to be rearranged by `#goToTest.replace#`

goToTest.replace.markdownDescription: (Only used when `#goToTest.strategy#`=`custom`) Template to compose the path based on the match of the source file.

scripts.test:all: npm run test:pretest && npm run test:tests && npm run test:pit
scripts.test:all:ci: npm run test:pretest && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e:ci && npm run test:pit
scripts.test:pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.test:tests: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
